price: Na kiwaonye wanao nena: Mwenyezi Mungu ana mwana.
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا
footnotes: Na kiwaonye kwa njia makhsusi wale walio msingizia Mwenyezi Mungu kuwa ana mwana, na hali Yeye ametakasika kuwa kama viumbe, akawa mwenye kuzaa au akazaliwa mtoto wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
